title: C plus plus
short_description: Learn how to use C++, a powerful and flexible programming language for adding website interactivity.
about: You interact with C++ code all the time, you just might not realize it. It powers dynamic behavior on websites (like this one) and plays an important role in many fields, like front- and back-end engineering, game and mobile development, virtual reality, and more. In this course, you’ll learn C++ fundamentals that will be helpful as you dive deeper into more advanced topics.

syllabus.title: Welcome to Learn C++
syllabus.courseData: Learn about what the C++ course has in store!

syllabus.title: Introduction
syllabus.courseData: In this course, you will learn about C++ data types, built-in methods, and variables.

syllabus.title: Conditionals
syllabus.courseData: Learn how to use if, else if, else, switch, and ternary syntax to control the flow of a program

syllabus.title: Functions
syllabus.courseData: Learn about C++ function syntax, passing data to functions, the return keyword, and concise body syntax.

syllabus.title: Scope
syllabus.courseData: Learn scope in C++

syllabus.title: Arrays
syllabus.courseData: In this course, you will learn about arrays, a data structure used to store lists of data.

syllabus.title: Loops
syllabus.courseData: In this course, you will learn how to use for and while loops to execute blocks of code multiple times.

syllabus.title: Iterators
syllabus.courseData: In this course, you will learn how to use iterator methods to simplify the process of looping over arrays.

syllabus.title: Break statement, Continue statement, Goto statement
syllabus.courseData: You will get to learn the statements mentioned above
